AH-64 Apache.name: AH-64 阿帕奇武装直升机

items.name: Hellfire Missiles
items.description:
@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.重武器 (HW)]{重武器 (HW)}. A laser-guided missile fired from a vehicle-mounted launcher.

Unless otherwise noted, missiles must “lock” onto their targets before they can be fired. This action is an opposed @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.电子学]{电子学} roll versus the target’s maneuvering skill (@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.驾船]{驾船}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.驾驶]{驾驶}, or @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.航空]{航空}, as appropriate). Success gives the attacker a “short” lock and allows him to fire up to half the missiles his particular craft can fire at once. A raise is a more solid lock and allows him to fire all of them.

The enemy attempts to evade each missile separately by making a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.追逐与载具{机动} roll at −4 (or −2 if the target has substantial cover to hide behind—such as asteroids, skyscrapers, canyon walls, or even large enemy ships. A @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性投骰]{大失败} means the craft goes @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-tables.失控]{失控}.

Anti-Missile Systems: Warships and futuristic space vessels often have “point defense” systems to shoot down incoming missiles. Operators must be on @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.待机]{待机} to shoot down missiles; automated systems attack automatically. The system grants a single @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.射击]{射击} roll per missile at @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.射程]{近距} and any other relevant modifiers (including @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.速度]{速度}—missiles move at Mach 1, a −6 penalty, unless otherwise noted). Unless otherwise noted, missiles are objects with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.角色]{坚韧} of 8 (2) (see @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.破坏物品]{破坏物品}).
items.notes: Heavy Weapon. A laser-guided missile fired from a vehicle-mounted launcher.

items.name: Sidewinder Missiles
items.description:
@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.重武器 (HW)]{重武器 (HW)}. A short range, heat-seeking missile fired from an aircraft.

Unless otherwise noted, missiles must “lock” onto their targets before they can be fired. This action is an opposed @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.电子学]{电子学} roll versus the target’s maneuvering skill (@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.驾船]{驾船}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.驾驶]{驾驶}, or @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.航空]{航空}, as appropriate). Success gives the attacker a “short” lock and allows him to fire up to half the missiles his particular craft can fire at once. A raise is a more solid lock and allows him to fire all of them.

The enemy attempts to evade each missile separately by making a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.追逐与载具{机动} roll at −4 (or −2 if the target has substantial cover to hide behind—such as asteroids, skyscrapers, canyon walls, or even large enemy ships. A @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性投骰]{大失败} means the craft goes @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-tables.失控]{失控}.

Anti-Missile Systems: Warships and futuristic space vessels often have “point defense” systems to shoot down incoming missiles. Operators must be on @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.待机]{待机} to shoot down missiles; automated systems attack automatically. The system grants a single @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.射击]{射击} roll per missile at @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.射程]{近距} and any other relevant modifiers (including @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.速度]{速度}—missiles move at Mach 1, a −6 penalty, unless otherwise noted). Unless otherwise noted, missiles are objects with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.角色]{坚韧} of 8 (2) (see @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.破坏物品]{破坏物品}).
items.notes: Heavy Weapon. A short range, heat-seeking missile fired from an aircraft.

Bicycle.name: 自行车
Bicycle.description: 50% chance a shot hits the rider instead. Doubles rider’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.移动]{移速} and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.移动]{奔跑骰} result.

Carriage.name: 马车
Carriage.description: Pulled by one @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-equipment.马]{马}. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.移动]{移速} on the tabletop is 12 and it may run.

Dirt Bike.name: 越野摩托车
Dirt Bike.description: Stock bike designed for off-road use with excellent shocks. Off Road (treat as @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.载具注释]{四轮驱动}). 50% chance any uncalled shot hits the character instead.

@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.重武器 (HW)]{重武器 (HW)}

items.name: 16 to 46 Cannons (12 lb), Solid Shot (Fixed Left and Right)
items.description:
Cannons are used to destroy city walls or break up large troop formations. The leader of the weapon’s crew makes the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.射击]{射击} roll.

Bombard: Assuming they have a rough idea of their target’s location, howitzers, mortars, and bombards may fire at targets they cannot see by lobbing projectiles over intervening terrain or obstacles. Bombarding suffers a −4 penalty in addition to all other modifiers, and doubles deviation when the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.射击]{射击} roll is failed (see @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.范围效果攻击]{范围效果攻击}). Reduce the penalty to −2 with precise coordinates (such as from a spotter).

Solid Shot: Heavy balls of iron, lead, or stone designed to batter walls or plow through packed ranks of troops. To fire, the leader of the crew makes a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.射击]{射击} roll as usual. If successful, roll a die. If even, it bounces to another victim behind and within 6” of the first and hits him as well. Continue in this way until the die roll is odd.

Compare the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.射击]{射击} roll to every target within using a base TN of 4, adjusted for each target’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.掩蔽与障碍]{掩蔽}, special abilities like the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-edges.闪避]{闪避} Edge, etc. A hit causes 2d6 damage and a raise causes 3d6.

Note: All types of shot are @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.重武器 (HW)]{重武器 (HW)}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.装填]{装填} 8. Two crew members may reload at the same time.
items.notes: All types of shot are Heavy Weapons, Reload 8. Two crew members may reload at the same time.

Galley.name: 桨帆船
Galley.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.载具注释]{重护甲}. Has both oars and sails.

items.name: Catapult (Fixed Front)
items.description:
@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.范围效果攻击]{中型爆散盖板}

@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.重武器 (HW)]{重武器 (HW)}, Reload time is every 5 minutes with a crew of 4.

Catapults are simple devices that hurl large stones at enemy defenses or ranks of troops. They normally require a crew of eight to load the projectile, crank down the lever that propels it, then sight and aim it. Firing can be done by a single person, but @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.装填]{装填} the projectile takes at least four.
items.notes: MBT, Heavy Weapon, Reload time is every 5 minutes with a crew of 4.

items.name: 50 cal MG (Front Pintle Mount)
items.description:
@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.重武器 (HW)]{重武器}

Machine guns are heavy, fully automatic weapons built to withstand prolonged fire. Most are fed by belts or drums and thus have far more ammo capacity than assault rifles, despite similar calibers and rates of fire.

Weapon Mount: Most machine-guns require a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-equipment.Bipod/Tripod]{Bipod/Tripod} or vehicle mount to fire, which eliminates any Strength requirement and the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.后坐力]{后坐力} penalty. Their @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.最低力量]{最低力量} is listed as “NA,” or “Not Applicable.” If a weapon has a Minimum Strength listed, it may be fired from the hip with the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.猝射]{猝射} and Recoil penalties.

Minimum Rate of Fire: Machine-guns have a minimum @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.射速]{射速} of 2 unless otherwise noted.

Reloading: Machine guns are @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.装填]{装填} 2, which includes changing belts or drums, cocking, etc.

items.name: Heavy MG (Rear Pintle Mount)
items.description: Minimum Rate of Fire: Vehicular weapons with a Rate of Fire 3 or higher have a minimum Rate of Fire of 2.

items.name: 4× torpedo tubes (Fixed Forward)
items.description:
Rocket launchers and early torpedoes are direct-fire weapons that explode on contact with their target. All the listed weapons are @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.重武器 (HW)]{重武器 (HW)}.

@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.范围效果攻击]{大型爆散盖板}

items.name: 88mm Tank Gun (AP Rounds) (Turret)
items.description:
Tank and AT Guns: May fire either @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.穿甲 (AP)]{穿甲} or @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.高爆 (HE)]{高爆} rounds as the gunner chooses. AP rounds do additional damage up close. Increase the weapon’s damage dice by one when fired at half their Short Range or less (so 4d10+2 becomes 5d10+2, for example).

@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.重武器 (HW)]{重武器 (HW)}

items.name: Medium Machine Gun (Front Fixed and in Turret)
items.description:
Minimum Rate of Fire: Vehicular weapons with a Rate of Fire 3 or higher have a minimum Rate of Fire of 2.

@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.重武器 (HW)]{重武器 (HW)}

items.name: 30mm Cannon (Fixed Front)
items.description: Minimum Rate of Fire: Vehicular weapons with a Rate of Fire 3 or higher have a minimum @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.射速]{射速} of 2.

items.name: Sidewinder Missiles (Soviet equivalent)
items.description:
@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.重武器 (HW)]{重武器}. A short range, heat-seeking missile fired from an aircraft. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.范围效果攻击]{小型爆散盖板}.

Unless otherwise noted, missiles must “lock” onto their targets before they can be fired. This action is an opposed @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.电子学]{电子学} roll versus the target’s maneuvering skill (@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.驾船]{驾船}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.驾驶]{驾驶}, or @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.航空]{航空}, as appropriate). Success gives the attacker a “short” lock and allows him to fire up to half the missiles his particular craft can fire at once. A raise is a more solid lock and allows him to fire all of them.

The enemy attempts to evade each missile separately by making a maneuvering roll at −4 (or −2 if the target has substantial cover to hide behind—such as asteroids, skyscrapers, canyon walls, or even large enemy ships. A @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性投骰]{大失败} means the craft goes @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-tables.失控]{失控}.

Anti-Missile Systems: Warships and futuristic space vessels often have “point defense” systems to shoot down incoming missiles. Operators must be on @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.待机]{待机} to shoot down missiles; automated systems attack automatically. The system grants a single @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.射击]{射击} roll per missile at Short @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.射程]{射程} and any other relevant modifiers (including @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.速度]{速度}—missiles move at Mach 1, a −6 penalty, unless otherwise noted). Unless otherwise noted, missiles are objects with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.破坏物品]{坚韧} of 8 (2).
items.notes: Heavy Weapon. A short range, heat-seeking missile fired from an aircraft.

Semi-Truck.name: 卡车
Semi-Truck.description: Trailer is @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.体型和尺寸]{体型} 7 (Large), @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.角色]{坚韧} 14 (2). *@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.载具注释]{操控性} with a trailer attached is –2.

Sports Car.description: Mustang or similar stock sports cars.

Sports Utility Vehicle.name: SUV
Sports Utility Vehicle.description: Luxury features, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.载具注释]{四轮驱动}

Street Bike.name: 城市摩托车
Street Bike.description: Stock name-brand street bikes designed for urban use. 50% chance any uncalled shot hits the character instead.
